id.description: The ARM id of the resource.

sendingMetrics.description: Flag indicating if resource is sending metrics to Logz.

reasonForMetricsStatus.description: Reason for why the resource is sending metrics (or why it is not sending).

sendingLogs.description: Flag indicating if resource is sending logs to Logz.

reasonForLogsStatus.description: Reason for why the resource is sending logs (or why it is not sending).

provisioningState.x-adl-name: Accepted | Creating | Updating | Deleting | Succeeded | Failed | Canceled | Deleted | NotSpecified

singleSignOnState.description: Various states of the SSO resource

enterpriseAppId.description: The Id of the Enterprise App used for Single sign-on.

singleSignOnUrl.description: The login URL specific to this Logz Organization.

provisioningState.x-adl-name: Accepted | Creating | Updating | Deleting | Succeeded | Failed | Canceled | Deleted | NotSpecified
provisioningState.description: The provisiong state of the SSO resource

enterpriseAppId.description: The Id of the Enterprise App used for Single sign on.

emailAddress.description: Email of the user used by Logz for contacting them if needed

phoneNumber.description: Phone number of the user used by Logz for contacting them if needed

usageType.description: different usage type like PAYG/COMMITTED. this could be enum

billingCycle.description: different billing cycles like MONTHLY/WEEKLY. this could be enum

planDetails.description: plan id as published by Logz
